features: NEW AND IMPROVED: Same care for sensitive eyes and skin, now in a biodegradable pad. Love our longwear and waterproof makeup remover pads? Now with a new look, and made with biodegradable pads!
LONGWEAR, WATERPROOF EYE MAKEUP REMOVAL: Wipe away all traces of eye makeup with ease—even longwear and stubborn waterproof mascara; no rinsing needed
GENTLE, EFFECTIVE CLEANSING: Our eye makeup removers are as gentle on your delicate eye area as they are effective at cleansing without pulling or tugging
FORMULATED WITHOUT: Parabens, phthalates, SLS, DMDM Hydantoin, formaldehydes, and Triclosan

SUITABLE FOR SENSITIVE EYES: As part of the Almay promise, this product is hypoallergenic and ophthalmologist tested as well as clean, cruelty free, and fragrance free; it is also suitable for sensitive eyes and contact lens wearers
body.description: Effortless makeup removal just got a lot easier on your eyes—and the environment! With Almay Biodegradable Longwear & Waterproof Eye Makeup Remover Pads™, you can wipe away all traces of eye makeup from shadow to liner—even longwear and stubborn waterproof mascara—instantly, no rinsing required. Made from 100% biodegradable fibers, each pad is designed to gently and effectively lift away makeup without pulling or tugging on your delicate eye area. What’s more, these petite rounds are suitable for sensitive eyes and contact lens wearers, so throw a pack in your bag for guilt-free cleansing on the go! Formulated without added parabens, phthalates, SLS, DMDM Hydantoin, formaldehydes, and Triclosan. As always, hypoallergenic. Ophthalmologist tested. Clean. Cruelty free. Fragrance free.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are gentle, effective and biodegradable
reviews.reviewText: I've used the product for years, and it never fails to take off my eye makeup without rubbing, because it's oil-based. It will leave your face greasy, so wash your face with soap after using.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does the trick!
reviews.reviewText: I put one on each eye and leave it on for 30 seconds and then I continue to clean the rest of my face with them too. I really like it!! You do need to actually wash your face with something else after because these are so oily though

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works Great (for me)
reviews.reviewText: Don't use baby oil if you don't like these. It's dangerous for your eyes. To me, these biodegradable pads do seem scratchy but they aren't meant to be used by rubbing. When I just left them on the eye about 10 seconds, the waterproof eye makeup came off easily and I could use the other side of the pad for the other eye. I had been using bottled eye makeup remover by target and it was making the skin under my eyes all red. The almay did not irritate my skin or eyes at all. I see many bad reviews and I guess everyone is different. But,I love these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Does what it says
reviews.reviewText: This eye makeup remover does precisely what it says and easily removes my water proof mascara. However, it leaves behind a very oily residue… often I don’t want to remove all my mascara, just touch up a place that’s rubbed off/smudged; however, if you use this the oily residue just causes more mascara around it to smudge and you end up having to fully wash it off.I have found that if I take a square of folded toilet paper or a q-tip and rub it across the makeup remover pad I can use that to do the touch ups and it doesn’t leave behind as much of the oily residue for just the touch up stuff. Kinda annoying to have to do that, but if you want something that will easily take off your hard to remove makeup this is it.Also nice that it doesn’t irritate my skin (and I have very sensitive skin being a ginger).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works just ok.
reviews.reviewText: I expected this product to remove my mascara more easily than it does, and the pads are rough and they irritate the eye area. I noticed the skin around my eyes was looking very haggard and older than it normally does, and I couldn't figure it out. I stopped using the pads and started using baby oil on an ordinary cotton pad and my eyes looked so much better... actually in one day they recovered! Disappointed that these pads seemed like they would be very helpful but wound up making my eyes look worse. And you really have to dab for quite a while to make the waterproof makeup come off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These take off my waterproof Mascara and eyeliner so well! I use 1 pad for each eye and it removes everything even when I'm wearing lots of eyeshadow, eyeliner, and Mascara. They do feel a bit greasy but if you properly remove your makeup and use other wipes, cleansers, or toner it's no problem! These are definetly going to last me a while and I'll be purchasing more when I run out!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Feels like baby oil
reviews.reviewText: These very small, oily feeling round eye wipes do not do the trick. I'll not buy them again. Because they feel like baby oil, it's difficult to open my eyes. Doesn't feel clean at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Product works really well. Better than others I have used. Cleans thoroughly. Downside is that it does leave your skin oily. Blotting recomendef

Llevo y dos años utilizando estos pads y la verdad es que los amo, quitan el maquillaje a prueba de agua muy fácil y rápido, un solo pad me sirve para toda la cara, yo lo que hago es primero pasarlo por los ojos y labios (que se llenen de desmaquillante) y dejarlo reposar unos minutos en lo que desmaquillo toda mi cara ya una vez que terminé, con los dedos termino froto muy suave y sale muy fácil, posteriormente con agua micelar retiro todo el producto y procedo a lavar mi cara con agua y jabón, ojo, esa es mi rutina, porque así me gusta a mi, pero tal vez se podría saltar el paso del agua micelar y aplicarlo como doble limpieza. Son 120 piezas, yo trato de no maquillarme diario, por lo que me dura unos 6 meses el frasquito, lo cual para mi es un excelente costo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Since the other brand of almay I couldn’t get anymore, I had to change to Biodegradable ones, there get my make up off great, I have to use a wet wipe afterward because of the greasy. But the greasy helps remove the make up off without rubbing to much, My eyes are really sensitive so finding stuff that doesn’t burn his hard and get my make up off at the same time his difficult, I hope these doesn’t get discontinued or get to dear to afford
Me gustó mucho. Con una sola toalla retiro el maquillaje de ojos. Cada toallita trae muy buena cantiad de producto y rinde muy bien. No irrita la piel.
